title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-5.4 - Withdrawal of a request for a fair hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-5.4 - Withdrawal of a request for a fair hearing

State Regulations
(a) OAH will consider a hearing request to be
withdrawn under the following circumstances: (1)
OAH has received a written statement from
the appellant or appellant's authorized representative stating that the request
for a fair hearing is withdrawn; or
(2)
the appellant or appellant's authorized
representative has made a statement withdrawing the request to the hearing
officer on the record at the hearing. (b) An oral statement by telephone or in
person to a social services agency employee that an appellant is withdrawing a
request for a fair hearing is insufficient to withdraw a fair hearing
request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
358-5.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
